Miscellaneous

Madmate and won't be Egoist. If the Egoist's team wins, the Egoist wins instead of his team.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Egoists that can be in a match
  • Spawn Chance
    • Set the percentage players have of getting Egoist
  • can become Egoist
    • : can become this role
    • : cannot become this role
  • An can become Egoist
    • : can become this role
    • : cannot become this role
  • Can See Other Egoist Impostor
    • : an can see the Egoist, and an Egoist can see the like normal
    • : the has no clue of his Egoist teammate

From: 小叨院长open in new window & Coding: KARPED1EMopen in new window
